Class OrderDAO

java.lang.Object
com.group18.dao.OrderDAO
public class OrderDAO extends Object
Data Access Object (DAO) for interacting with the 'orders' and 'order_items' tables in the database. Provides methods for creating, retrieving, updating, and deleting orders and order items.

  • Method Details

    • createOrder

      public boolean createOrder(Order order)
      Creates a new order and associated order items in the database.
      Parameters:
      order - The Order object containing the order details.
      Returns:
      true if the order is successfully created; false otherwise.

    • restoreProductStock

      public boolean restoreProductStock(int orderId)
      Restores the stock of products when an order is canceled.
      Parameters:
      orderId - The ID of the order to be canceled.
      Returns:
      true if the product stock is successfully restored; false otherwise.

    • restoreSeats

      public boolean restoreSeats(int orderId)
      Restores the available seats for tickets when an order is canceled.
      Parameters:
      orderId - The ID of the order to be canceled.
      Returns:
      true if the seats are successfully restored; false otherwise.

    • getOrdersByDateRange

      public List<Order> getOrdersByDateRange(LocalDateTime startDate, LocalDateTime endDate)
      Retrieves orders from the database that fall within the specified date range.
      Parameters:
      startDate - The start of the date range.
      endDate - The end of the date range.
      Returns:
      A list of orders within the specified date range.

    • getAllOrders

      public List<Order> getAllOrders()
      Retrieves all orders from the database.
      Returns:
      A list of all orders in the database.

    • processCancellation

      public boolean processCancellation(int orderId, boolean cancelProducts, boolean cancelTickets)
      Processes the cancellation of an order by updating stock and seat availability. Also calculates any applicable refunds.
      Parameters:
      orderId - The ID of the order to be canceled.
      cancelProducts - Whether to cancel the products in the order.
      cancelTickets - Whether to cancel the tickets in the order.
      Returns:
      true if the cancellation is successfully processed; false otherwise.

    • rejectCancellation

      public boolean rejectCancellation(int orderId)
      Rejects the cancellation of an order.
      Parameters:
      orderId - The ID of the order to be rejected.
      Returns:
      true if the cancellation is successfully rejected; false otherwise.

    • getCancellationStats

      public OrderDAO.CancellationStats getCancellationStats()
      Retrieves statistics about cancellations, including pending cancellations and processed cancellations for today.
      Returns:
      A CancellationStats object containing cancellation statistics.

    • getOrderItemsForOrder

      private List<OrderItem> getOrderItemsForOrder(int orderId)
      Retrieves all order items associated with a specific order.
      Parameters:
      orderId - The ID of the order.
      Returns:
      A list of order items for the specified order.

    • storeDocuments

      public boolean storeDocuments(int orderId, byte[] receiptPdf, byte[] ticketsPdf)
      Stores receipt and ticket PDFs for an order.
      Parameters:
      orderId - The ID of the order.
      receiptPdf - The receipt PDF as a byte array.
      ticketsPdf - The tickets PDF as a byte array.
      Returns:
      true if the PDFs are successfully stored; false otherwise.

    • retrieveReceipt

      public byte[] retrieveReceipt(int orderId)
      Retrieves the receipt PDF for a specific order.
      Parameters:
      orderId - The ID of the order.
      Returns:
      The receipt PDF as a byte array, or null if not found.

    • retrieveTickets

      public byte[] retrieveTickets(int orderId)
      Retrieves the tickets PDF for a specific order.
      Parameters:
      orderId - The ID of the order.
      Returns:
      The tickets PDF as a byte array, or null if not found.

    • extractOrderFromResultSet

      private Order extractOrderFromResultSet(ResultSet rs) throws SQLException
      Extracts order details from a ResultSet.
      Parameters:
      rs - The ResultSet containing the order data.
      Returns:
      An Order object populated with the data from the ResultSet.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If an SQL error occurs while extracting the data.
